attributes.action: upgrade and update Armed Forces Housing to adequate standards for fighting heroes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister is urged to give his immeditae attention to the terrible state of housing inflicted upon mnay members of the Armed Forces. The houses are often damp, cold, in need of repairs, and generally unsuitable for living in. All this whilst still expecting the serving members to fight and risk their lives overseas while their families live in appalling conditions. SURELY THIS SHOULD BE MORE OF A PRIORITY THAN TOP RATE ACCOMODATION FOR ASYLUM SEEKERS. Give our boys and girls what they deserve for such a sterling job- sterling housing!

government_responses.details:
